biocontainers.name: jaffa
biocontainers.summary: Jaffa is a multi-step pipeline that takes either raw rna-seq reads, or pre-assembled transcripts then searches\nfor gene fusions. this package contains the wrappers jaffa-direct, jaffa-assembly, and jaffa-hybrid. you can pass the \"refseq\" parameter in the environment variables jaffa_ref_base. otherwise, pass any paramters\nto the wrappers as you would to the bpipe jaffa_{method} call in the manual.
